amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Endowment for the Arts by $30 million and increase funding for the United States Forest Service by $27.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for Wildland Management by $27,500,000, to increase funding for hazardous fuels reduction activities and to reduce funding for the Nation Endowment for the Arts--Grants and Administration by $30 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beauprez amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 122 - 298 (Roll no. 195).
